quiz.intro: We know what's holding you back...
quiz.question: What is your goal?
quiz.option1Label: Migrate applications or infrastructure to AWS quickly
quiz.option2Label: Secure infrastructure and meet regulations from the ground up
quiz.option3Label: Integrate data from multiple sources and operationalize with pipelines
quiz.option4Label: Develop Generative AI use cases in an agile way with tangible impact
quiz.option1Info: After migrating to AWS, companies accelerate time-to-market for new features by 43% and reduce release cycles by 31%.
quiz.option1Desc: Speed and stability with automated methodologies.
quiz.option2Info: Companies that apply automation and AI in security reduce the cost of a breach by ~USD 2.2 million and shorten response cycles.
quiz.option2Desc: Secure-by-design and "automated enforcement" to mitigate risks from the root.
quiz.option3Info: Organizations that intensify analytics use are 23x more likely to excel at customer acquisition.
quiz.option3Desc: Reliable, scalable pipelines for your data.
quiz.option4Info: Real IDP use cases have increased invoice processing capacity by over 30% and reduced commercial errors by up to 67%.
quiz.option4Desc: Automate extraction, classification and validation of documents.

solutionsSection.title: You choose how to start.
solutionsSection.subtitleLine2: We handle migration, data, automation and security so

solutionsSection.i4Desc: Turn every purchase into a memorable experience. Deliver experiences that build loyalty in digital, physical and logistics commerce with Escala 24x7 and AWS.
solutionsSection.i5Desc: Create memorable experiences from first click to check-out. With Escala 24x7 and AWS deliver personalization that exceeds expectations, drives loyalty and maximizes revenue from the first interaction.

nosotros.title: About us - Escala 24x7
nosotros.heroSubtitle: We don't just manage the cloud.
nosotros.heroSubtitleBold: We turn it into the engine of your business.
nosotros.heroStatText: We are a highly certified team, operating 24/7, with processes, talent, and business scale.
nosotros.statsPart3: : the difference between migrating to the cloud and transforming your business with control, security, and resilience.
nosotros.statsPart5: we accompany leaders in every industry from vision to results.

nosotros.sustIntro: At Escala 24x7, sustainability is not just a commitment; it is a reflection of our technologies. With our Cloud Done Right Partner approach, and our commitment to educational delivery frameworks for Cloud Guardians.
nosotros.sustSubtitle: Minimize environmental footprint and contribute to a
nosotros.sustFeature1Text: With our Escala Goes Green initiative and our #GoGreenWithEscala24x7 hashtag, we promote a culture of environmental awareness, recycling and sustainable habits.
nosotros.sustFeature2Text: We planted around 200 trees in CDMX with the community and use recyclable materials in all our printed materials.
nosotros.sustFeature3Text: Together with AWS we promote global sustainability initiatives, educating on efficient, optimized and environmentally responsible architectures.

cloudMigration.title: Cloud Migration - Escala 24x7
cloudMigration.heroDescription: At Escala 24x7 we modernize and migrate critical platforms with operational, financial and risk control.
cloudMigration.heroStat: of companies recognize that their legacy infrastructure holds back innovation and that more than 14% of their cloud migration budget is lost to overruns and delays.
cloudMigration.useCasesTitleStrong: optimize costs and scale without limits
cloudMigration.whatIsTitle: Cloud Migration is more than moving servers
cloudMigration.whatIsDescription: We guide you step by step with a proven framework that aligns people, business and technology.
cloudMigration.whatIsFeature1Text: We analyze your portfolio to validate the business case, identify gaps and enable access to special AWS support programs.
cloudMigration.whatIsFeature2Text: We deploy a base environment with our Cloud Foundations solution, establishing governance and security from the start.
cloudMigration.whatIsFeature3Text: We execute the transition with tailored strategies toward cloud-native and serverless architectures, ensuring continuity and progressive evolution of your workloads.
cloudMigration.whatIsFeature4Text: We ensure stability and performance post-migration with Cloud EMx, through managed services and constant optimization.
cloudMigration.largeScaleIntro: We support your critical cloud migration operations with a structured model that integrates assessment, preparation, execution and operations, ensuring control, continuity and business outcomes.
cloudMigration.largeScaleLi3: Portfolio management and visibility of workloads.
cloudMigration.largeScaleLi4: Increased predictability in costs and timelines.
cloudMigration.expressIntro: Accelerate your cloud migration with automation, agile frameworks and AWS tools that let you move applications or entire environments in a matter of days.
cloudMigration.expressLi1: Migration in days, with no operational disruption.
cloudMigration.expressLi3: Lower risk and reduced adoption timelines.
cloudMigration.expressLi4: Infrastructure optimized from day one with Escala 24x7.
cloudMigration.ibmIntro: Transform your IBM environments with a clear, secure strategy ready for the cloud.
cloudMigration.ibmLi3: Access to new AWS capabilities without compromising stability.
cloudMigration.ibmLi4: Gradual, controlled modernization of AS/400, AIX and Mainframe environments.
cloudMigration.appModIntro: We modernize your critical applications on AWS to free you from legacy systems, gain agility, reduce risk and enable new capabilities such as serverless and GenAI, without affecting business continuity.
cloudMigration.appModLi3: Modern architectures based on microservices and serverless.
cloudMigration.cloudNativeIntro1: Transform your operations with automation, agility and full control.
cloudMigration.cloudNativeIntro2: Drive team collaboration and operational efficiency through automated pipelines, infrastructure as code and practices that ensure fast, secure deployments with Escala 24x7.
cloudMigration.cloudNativeLi4: DevOps culture that powers continuous innovation.
cloudMigration.acceleratorTitle: We are the accelerator for your cloud migration initiatives.
cloudMigration.feature1Desc: We handle the management, optimization and security of your AWS infrastructure.
cloudMigration.feature2Desc: Get full management of your AWS infrastructure with an expert team available 24/7.
cloudMigration.feature3Desc: Reduce costs and ensure security at every operational layer, without interruption.
cloudMigration.feature4Desc: We anticipate and solve problems before they impact your operation.
cloudMigration.ctaTitle: Maximize your operation performance from day 1.
cloudMigration.ctaDescription: Cost optimization, guaranteed scalability and proven methodologies with Escala 24x7.

partner.title: Partner - Escala 24x7
partner.heroSubtitle: Our strategic alliances are based on innovation to support projects for organizations of all kinds, improving their experience with AWS.
partner.introParagraph: Stefanini is a global technology consultancy with over 38 years of driving innovation in the market. By combining Escala 24x7's specialization in the AWS ecosystem with Stefanini's global reach, we strengthen our ability to deliver comprehensive automation, IoT, and user experience (UX) solutions worldwide.
partner.danaSubtitle: Secure communication automation for critical processes
partner.danaParagraph: DANAconnect is a communication automation platform with intelligent flows and omnichannel capabilities, designed to meet the highest standards of security, governance, and audit in the financial industry.
partner.danaLi1: Complete portfolio of communication automation solutions.
partner.danaLi2: Intelligent flows and 100% digital Customer Journey, end to end.
partner.danaLi3: Elimination of manual processes with a focus on efficiency, control and compliance.
partner.lightedgeSubtitle: Secure, managed hybrid infrastructure for digital transformation
partner.lightedgeParagraph: Lightedge offers hybrid infrastructure solutions and managed services that enable companies to modernize their IT with security, control and compliance, combining private, public and colocation cloud to suit each organization.
partner.lightedgeLi1: Hybrid architectures that unify colocation, private and public cloud (including AWS and Azure) under single management.
partner.lightedgeLi2: 24/7/365 managed services to ensure performance, availability and continuous compliance.
partner.lightedgeLi3: Advanced security, compliance and data protection solutions (HIPAA, SOC, PCI, HITRUST, NIST, GDPR).

especializaciones.title: Specializations - Escala 24x7
especializaciones.parrafo1: Our 14 AWS Competencies certify much more than technical knowledge: they validate the ability to design, operate and scale critical cloud environments with security, resilience and a focus on business results.
especializaciones.parrafo2: Each specialization reflects proven experience in migration, modernization, continuous operation and advanced services such as AI, data, security and DevOps, applied to industries where availability, compliance and performance are not optional.
especializaciones.parrafo3: We combine these competencies with a deep understanding of the dynamics and real challenges of sectors such as Finance, Energy, Retail, Manufacturing and Travel & Hospitality, to turn the cloud into a tangible competitive advantage, not just a technology platform.
especializaciones.card1Desc: We are specialists in migration and modernization on AWS. With this competency you get access to:
especializaciones.card1Li2: Standardized methodologies that accelerate your migration
especializaciones.card2Desc: We are specialists in GenAI solutions on AWS. With this competency you get access to:
especializaciones.card2Li1: AI solutions aligned to your business objectives
especializaciones.card2Li2: Experience validated by AWS and multiple industries
especializaciones.card3Desc: This specialization certifies our experience supporting financial institutions in their digital transformation. With it you get access to:
especializaciones.card3Li1: Technology modernization without affecting operational continuity
especializaciones.card3Li3: Robust infrastructure, from core to edge, with high performance and compliance
especializaciones.card4Desc: We are specialists in implementing security solutions on AWS. With it you get access to:
especializaciones.card4Li2: AWS best practices to protect data and applications
especializaciones.card4Li3: AWS programs that optimize costs and strengthen your secure cloud adoption
especializaciones.card5Desc: This competency demonstrates Escala 24x7's ability to protect and monitor essential resources on AWS. With it you get access to:
especializaciones.card5Li2: Flexibility to complement your in-house team or outsource operations
especializaciones.card5Li3: Maximum use of AWS native security services
especializaciones.card6Desc: This competency validates our ability to design and implement modern, scalable data platforms. With it you get access to:
especializaciones.card7Desc: Our expertise in Cloud Operations and Governance on AWS ensures secure, optimized, business-aligned operations. With it you get access to:
especializaciones.card7Li3: Efficient cloud operations ready to scale
especializaciones.card8Desc: This AWS competency certifies our ability to ensure your business continuity. With it you get access to:
especializaciones.card8Li3: Disaster Recovery with 24x7 support and monitoring
especializaciones.card9Desc: Through this competency, AWS certifies our capability in implementing DevOps tools on AWS. With it you get access to:
especializaciones.card9Li3: AWS programs that optimize cost and efficiency
especializaciones.card10Desc: Our SAP specialization validates our ability to implement, migrate and transform SAP environments in the cloud. With it you get access to:
especializaciones.card10Li1: Experts specialized in SAP projects on AWS
especializaciones.card10Li3: AWS programs that optimize costs and reduce risk
especializaciones.card11Desc: This certification in the energy sector validates our ability to modernize critical systems without compromising security or operational continuity. With it you get access to:
especializaciones.card11Li2: Secure integration of ERP and monitoring platforms
especializaciones.card11Li3: End-to-end experience, from Core to Edge, to respond critically and agile to the market
especializaciones.card12Desc: Through this competency, AWS certifies our capability in implementing Virtual Desktops and Applications in the cloud. With it you get access to:
especializaciones.card12Li1: Experts specialized in AWS WorkSpaces and AppStream 2.0
especializaciones.card12Li3: Cost optimization and secure operation strategies
especializaciones.card13Desc: This AWS competency certifies our capability in business continuity. With it you get access to:
especializaciones.card13Li1: Experts specialized in resilience and recovery
especializaciones.card13Li2: Standardized practices to design and implement Disaster Recovery
especializaciones.card13Li3: Secure architectures with reliable backup and recovery processes
especializaciones.card14Desc: Our specialization in digital transformation for SMBs drives their secure, efficient growth on AWS. With it you get access to:
especializaciones.card14Li1: Solutions tailored to your business needs
especializaciones.card14Li3: Scalability, cost optimization and integrated security

dataManagement.heroDescription: At Escala 24x7 we support you to enable the next level of business intelligence.
dataManagement.heroStatText: of business decisions are still made by intuition, not by data.

dataManagement.tab1Intro2: Implement a robust Data Management with Escala 24x7 to organize, understand and structure your data, creating the ideal foundation for advanced analytics and future transformation initiatives.

dataManagement.tab2Intro2: With a strategic Data Management approach, at Escala 24x7 we help you design and implement automated pipelines for data ingestion, transformation and processing in a scalable, consistent and secure way.

dataManagement.tab4Intro2: Leveraging the power of Artificial Intelligence, at Escala 24x7 we help you extract maximum value from your information through advanced analytics solutions that solve complex business problems, improve operational efficiency and reduce risk through real-time data analysis.

managedServices.title: Managed Services - Escala 24x7
managedServices.heroDescription: Elevate the end-to-end management of your AWS infrastructure with a team of experts available 24/7.
managedServices.heroStatText: With advanced tools and intelligent automation, we improve performance, reduce costs and ensure operational security.
managedServices.useCasesTitleBr: you get monitoring, proactive support, security and control of costs in a single solution.
managedServices.costDesc: Expense control and consumption governance from day one.
managedServices.costIntro: With Escala 24x7 you optimize costs and define usage policies to keep your budget under control with visibility, FinOps alerts and actionable recommendations.
managedServices.supportDesc: Operational continuity with SLAs and centralized incident management.
managedServices.supportIntro: With Escala 24x7 you optimize your CI/CD pipeline with expert diagnosis and step-by-step guidance.
managedServices.infraDesc: End-to-end infrastructure management, accelerated response and problem resolution times, and ongoing guidance.
managedServices.infraIntro: When you face a critical EKS incident, Escala 24x7 acts immediately with diagnosis, remediation and direct management with AWS via PLS.
managedServices.infraLi2: Proactive, hands-on operation in security, resilience, FinOps and architecture.

managedServices.ibmIntro: With certified experts and 24/7 monitoring, Escala 24x7 manages, optimizes and protects your IBM platforms to ensure performance, availability and operational continuity.
managedServices.ibmLi4: Expert advisory on scalability, security and compliance.

managedServices.cxLi2: Resolution of critical incidents, outages and service degradation in production.

securityCompliance.tab1Desc: When data grows faster than control, risk becomes invisible.

securityCompliance.tab2Desc: Incidents don't appear overnight: they build up in silence.

generativeAi.useCasesTitleBr:
AI solutions for any
stage of maturity in adoption.
generativeAi.basicsTab1: EBA for Innovation in AI, ML and GenAI
generativeAi.basics1Title: EBA for Innovation in AI, ML and GenAI
generativeAi.basics1Desc: Reduce uncertainty, gain strategic clarity and move toward concrete use cases with expert support.
generativeAi.basics1Intro: With Escala 24x7, accelerate in just 3 days the identification of real AI/ML/GenAI opportunities, define your adoption path and validate its value with a functional PoC.
generativeAi.basics1Li3: Innovation with AI solutions from day one.
generativeAi.basics2Desc: Ensure responsible use of AI, reduce risks and ensure every initiative has metrics, controls and measurable success criteria.
generativeAi.basics2Intro: Escala 24x7 defines design principles and practices for AI solutions, establishes roles and policies, and standardizes the lifecycle to organize, control and strengthen your operations.
generativeAi.basics2Li2: Transparency, traceability and responsible AI adoption.
generativeAi.basics3Desc: Get full visibility of your data, meet regulations without friction and make reliable decisions at all times.
generativeAi.basics3Intro: At Escala 24x7 we help you define your AI solutions strategy and design an architecture that organizes, connects and ensures the quality of your data from the ground up.
generativeAi.basics3Li3: Greater alignment between business and technology.
generativeAi.offer1Desc: Drive Generative AI adoption with multidisciplinary teams that design, prototype and scale high-impact solutions.
generativeAi.offer1Intro: With Escala, turn your ideas into generative AI solutions ready to run on AWS. GenAI Squads supports your organization from use case identification to production deployment, ensuring speed, quality and governance, adapting the team to the pace and complexity of your business.
generativeAi.offer2Desc: Transform critical document management with AI solutions that extract, classify and validate information in minutes, eliminating manual tasks, reducing errors and speeding up decisions.
generativeAi.offer2Intro: Escala 24x7 combines OCR, generative models and automated workflows on AWS to process documents with precision, compliance and traceability, adapting to your organization's maturity level.
generativeAi.offer3Desc: Speed up credit application assessment with generative AI solutions that analyze histories in seconds, eliminate manual review and enable faster, consistent, traceable decisions.
generativeAi.offer3Intro: Escala 24x7 integrates Amazon Bedrock models with your systems to generate clear, ready-to-use analysis, streamlining processes, improving conversions and customer experience.
generativeAi.offer4Desc: Automate repetitive helpdesk tasks with an AI virtual assistant that resolves common requests in seconds, without human intervention.
generativeAi.offer4Intro: With Escala 24x7, improve support experience and reduce costs with AI solutions that centralize knowledge, offer immediate responses to users and integrate tools like ServiceNow, Jira, Teams or Slack.
generativeAi.offer5Desc: Turn phone interactions into strategic information with AI solutions that analyze sentiment, key topics, risks and opportunities, optimizing operations and improving customer experience to meet regulations through clear dashboards.
generativeAi.offer5Intro: Escala 24x7 combines Amazon Transcribe, Comprehend and advanced analytics to help you identify churn, optimize scripts, train agents, detect sales opportunities and boost your contact center performance.
generativeAi.offer6Desc: Modernize financial processes with intelligent automation and predictive analytics.
generativeAi.offer6Intro: Implement AI in forecasting, anomaly detection, accounts payable/receivable automation and cash flow optimization.
generativeAi.offer2AccordionText: Amazon Textract, Amazon Comprehend, Amazon Bedrock, automated processing workflows and Escala 24x7 accelerators.
generativeAi.offer3AccordionText: Amazon SageMaker, custom ML models, credit bureau integration, real-time decision APIs and Escala 24x7 frameworks.
generativeAi.offer4AccordionText: Amazon Bedrock, Amazon Lex, AWS Lambda, ITSM tool integration, knowledge bases and Escala 24x7 conversational frameworks.
generativeAi.offer5AccordionText: Amazon Connect, Amazon Transcribe, Amazon Comprehend, analytics dashboards and Escala 24x7 analysis frameworks.
generativeAi.offer6AccordionText: Amazon SageMaker, Amazon Forecast, ML models for finance, ERP integration and Escala 24x7 financial frameworks.
